Field.ElementPreceedingHeader:
The following questions ask about how you have been feeling over the last two weeks.
Please put a tick in the box which is closest to how you have been feeling.
Example: If you have felt in low spirits or sad slightly more than half of the time during the last two weeks put a tick in the third button.
Field.ElementLabel: 1. Have you felt in low spirits or sad?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
5, 5 - All of the time 
 4, 4 - Most of the time 
 3, 3 - More than half of the time 
 2, 2 - Less than half of the time 
 1, 1 - Some of the time 
 0, 0 - At no time

StructuredValue.Value: 3 - More than half of the time
2 - Less than half of the time

Field.ElementLabel: 10a. Have you suffered from reduced appetite?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
5, 5 - All of the time 
 4, 4 - Most of the time 
 3, 3 - More than half of the time 
 2, 2 - Less than half of the time 
 1, 1 - Some of the time 
 0, 0 - At no time

StructuredValue.Value: 3 - More than half of the time
2 - Less than half of the time

Field.ElementLabel: 10b. Have you suffered from increased appetite?

ElementEnum.RawValue:
5, 5 - All of the time 
 4, 4 - Most of the time 
 3, 3 - More than half of the time 
 2, 2 - Less than half of the time 
 1, 1 - Some of the time 
 0, 0 - At no time

StructuredValue.Value: 3 - More than half of the time
2 - Less than half of the time

2 - Less than half of the time
